channel.title: Gross-margins on WETHOD / Learning Center

item.description: weight: “93” date: 2021-03-22T23:00:00+00:00 title: Gross Margin type: “ menu: company: weight: 4 Overview Here you can see the details about Profit & Loss’ gross margin for each month of the current year. A project’s gross margin is the difference between its revenues and its external costs. Three important indicators are given in the first rows: Total: the sum of all your projects’ gross margin, per month Bluesky: the difference between revenues’ bluesky and external costs’ bluesky
